tool_description: Solves Mixed-Integer Linear Programs using the simplex method.
name: Linear Program Solver
title: Linear Program Solver

api_list.name: solve
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linear-program-solver.p.rapidapi.com/solve"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linear-program-solver.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://linear-program-solver.p.rapidapi.com/solve"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
